Frequently Asked Questions

How much does heat pump installation cost?

Heat Pump Installation starts at $4200. Price varies by efficiency and features. We provide upfront pricing before any work begins.

How long does heat pump installation take?

1-2 days for installation. We work efficiently to minimize disruption while ensuring quality workmanship.

Do you offer a warranty on heat pump installation?

Yes, we provide 10-year warranty on equipment, 2-year on installation. All work is backed by our satisfaction guarantee.
